message:
SYSTEM: PURE.pdf: Página 12
●Access policies are expressed using rules or assertions. 
●For each rule on a secrecy Si
si, there is a mapping that 
describes Si
si as a conjunctive query (Local-As-View 
approach).
e.g. S1(X,W):-has(X,Y),disease(Y,'PAC'), 
is_characterized_by(Y,Z),five_year_rate(Z,W)
     where PAC=Pancreatic Cancer
PURE: Secrecies
12
speaker: SYSTEM
